snippet: President Dilma Rousseff sent the Brazilian Congress political reform proposals on Tuesday in an attempt to assuage the public after a wave of massive street protests in June.
abstract: President Dilma Rousseff sends Brazilian Congress political reform proposals in attempt to assuage public after wave of massive street protests in June.
lead_paragraph: President Dilma Rousseff sent the Brazilian Congress political reform proposals on Tuesday in an attempt to assuage the public after a wave of massive street protests in June.

headline.main: Brazil: President Submits a List of Reforms for a National Vote
headline.print_headline: Brazil: President Submits a List Of Reforms for a National Vote
